document.masterDocTitle: Arboreal Beetles Of Neotropical Forests: Taxonomic Supplement For The Agra Virgata And Ohausi Groups With A New Species And Additional Distribution Records (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Arboreal Beetles Of Neotropical Forests: Taxonomic Supplement For The Agra Virgata And Ohausi Groups With A New Species And Additional Distribution Records (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographical Distribution ( Fig. 3 ). Previously know from Veracruz , México and northeastern Guatemala , numerous new collections show that the distribution is much more widespread, extending from Los Tuxlas, Veracruz, to Cerro Campana, Panama´, and with many localities now known from Costa Rica due to the INBio National Survey initiative.
